    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:leno_es_20070518_2_0050203</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>leno_es_20070518_2_0050203</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Yeísmo: características y extensión</string>
            <string language="en">Yeísmo: characteristics and extension</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Yeísmo: Eigenschaften und Extension</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Yeísmo : caractéristiques et extension</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Yeísmo: características e extensão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Yeísmo: caratteristiche ed estensione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Yeνsmo: χαρακτηριστικά και επέκταση</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Variedad que se produce en la lengua española al pronunciar la 'll' como 'y'. Es un fenómeno en alza debido al uso continuo en radio y televisión.</string>
            <string language="en">Distinction produced in Spanish when 'll' is pronounced as 'y'. It is a very extended phenomenon due to its recurrence on radio and television.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Lengua Castellana y Literatura</string>
            <string language="en">Castilian and Literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Yeísmo</string>
            <string language="en">Yeísmo</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterscheidung produzierte auf spanisch, wenn ' ll
' als ' y ' ausgesprochen wird. Es ist ein sehr ausgedehntes 
Phänomen wegen seines Wiederauftretens auf Radio und Fernsehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La distinction a produit dans l'Espagnol quand le 
'll 'est prononcé en tant que 'y '. C'est un phénomène très 
étendu dû à sa répétition sur la radio et la télévision.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A distinção produziu no espanhol quando ' o ll '
é pronunciado como ' y '. É um fenômeno muito prolongado  
devido a seu retorno no rádio e na televisão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La distinzione ha prodotto nello Spagnolo quando 
'il ll 'è pronunciato come 'y '. È un fenomeno molto esteso 
dovuto la relativa ricorrenza sulla radio e sulla televisione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάκριση που παράγεται στα ισπανικά όταν "ll" 
προφέρεται ως "Υ". Είναι ένα πολύ εκτεταμένο φαινόμενο 
λόγω στην επανάληψή του στο ραδιόφωνο και την τηλεόραση.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Castilian und Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Yeísmo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Castillan et littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Yeísmo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Castilian e literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Yeísmo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Castilian e letteratura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Yeísmo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καστιλιάνος και λογοτεχνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Yeνsmo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
